Species.Name: Notechomp
Species.Description: A very friendly dog like Beat, it makes different instrument noises based on it's mood.

Species.Name: Trompatooter
Species.Description: A very bird like Beat, keep your distance from this Beat because it's very load trumpet sounds will deafen you.

Species.Name: Metroraf
Species.Description: A very long giraffe like beat, it looks a bit scary when you look at it since it doesn't like to move, only the metronome on it's belly moves.

Species.Name: Fred
Species.Description: Who named him Fred? Why not a more serious name, like Mr.Ping.
